discrete.description: Styles the slider as a discrete slider.

with-tick-marks.description: Discrete sliders support display markers on their tracks.

model-value.description: The current value of the slider. (Array value for range slider)

min.description: The minimum value a slider can have.

max.description: The maximum value a slider can have.

step.description: Specifies the increments at which a slider value can be set.

disabled.description: Whether or not the slider is disabled.
